p: The current study was conducted with 40 Wistar Albino male rats which were brought from Uludağ University Animal House; their weight average was 200–250 g. The rats were kept in individual cages and were housed in groups of 4 per cage. All the utilized rats were kept in a temperature-controlled environment (25 ± 2°C) on a 12 : 12 h light: dark photoperiod. They were given free access to tap water and basic laboratory food which consists of 25% proteins, 3% vitamins, 35% carbohydrates, and 7% lipids for one week before starting the trial. Experimental protocols, ethical procedures, and policies were authorized according to the Animal Care and Use Committee of Uludağ University (2018-04/13).
